targets.query: SELECT mean("cpucore") FROM "load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("min1") FROM "load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("min5") FROM "load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("min15") FROM "load" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("user") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("system") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("/.percent") FROM "fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval)
SELECT mean("/.used") FROM "fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)
SELECT mean("/.size") FROM "fs" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($interval) fill(null)

list.name: container
list.query: show field keys on glances from "$host.docker"

list.name: interface
list.query: show field keys on glances from "$host.network"

list.name: disk
list.query: show field keys on glances from "$host.diskio"
